name: Concrete and Steel
description: Concrete And Steel is a 3D sandbox for creative people to build structures using a huge range of objects and materials. Experience unlimited creativity with huge environments, rich customisation, co-operative multiplayer, modding support and more! The only limit is your imagination!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: 2.0 ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: 3.0 ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0, Nvidia GTX 960 DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Mouse with scroll wheel
